segments.text: Do you have any plan on your mind ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to see all places of renown in Suzhou .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How are we going there , by bike or by bus ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: By bike , of course.You don't want to miss the beautiful scenery , do you ?
segments.speaker: S2
